title: Who was Britain’s greatest prime minister? Margaret Thatcher
itunes:title: Who was Britain’s greatest prime minister? Margaret Thatcher
itunes:subtitle: In the latest episode in our series on the prime ministers that experts believe accomplished most, Andrew Roberts nominates Margaret Thatcher.
description:
In the latest episode of our new series profiling the prime ministers that experts believe accomplished most during their time in 10 Downing Street, historian and author Andrew Roberts nominates Margaret Thatcher, who combined ideological drive with steely determination.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
